The '''[[2008 NFL season|2008]] [[Arizona Cardinals]] season''' is the 89th season for the team in the [[National Football League]] and their 21st season in [[Arizona]]. They compiled a 9-7 regular season record, winning their division for the first time since 1975, and on January 3, 2009, hosted a postseason game for the first time since 1947.
The '''[[2008 NFL season|2008]] [[Arizona Cardinals]] season''' is the 89th season for the team in the [[National Football League]] and their 21st season in [[Arizona]]. They compiled a 9-7 regular season record, winning their division for the first time since 1975, and on January 3, 2009, hosted a postseason game for the first time since 1947.
